name: analog-clock
description: Analog clocks made out of item spawns.
author: voximity

authed-roles.description: Roles authorized to create/modify clock hands.

update-rate-seconds.description: How often, in milliseconds to update clock hands that represent seconds.

update-rate-minutes.description: How often, in milliseconds, to update clock hands that represent minutes.

update-rate-hours.description: How often, in milliseconds, to update clock hands that represent hours.
